awardsAchievements.title: Vice Chancellor’s List Honoree for Academic Excellence
description: Recognized for consistently outstanding academic performance, maintaining a top-tier GPA throughout the undergraduate program.

awardsAchievements.title: Scholarship in University
description: Awarded the RUET Academic Scholarship four times for brilliant academic performance.

awardsAchievements.title: Perfect Attendance Award
description: Demonstrated commitment and responsibility by maintaining 100% attendance throughout the academic year.

awardsAchievements.title: Secondary School Certificate (SSC) Examination
description: Received a scholarship for excellence in the SSC examination in Talentpool Grade with a stipend from 2017 to 2019.
